description: EIA Screening and Scoping Opinion for the demolition and comprehensiveredevelopment for up to 700 residential units (Class C3 and including PRS) in buildings of up to 18 storeys, commercial uses, new access arrangements from Forest Road, Car Parking, Provision of new plant andrenewable energy equipment; creation of servicing areas and provision of associated services, including waste, refuse, cycle storage, and lighting; and for the laying out of the buildings; routes and open spaces within the development; and all associated works and operationsincluding but not limited to: demolition; earthworks; provision of attenuation infrastructure; engineering operations.
site_name: Homebase, 2c Fulbourne Road, Walthamstow, London, E17 4EE
